straddles(N, endpoints=True) → bool
Parameters

  • N (numeric) – Number to check

  • endpoints (bool) – Whether to include the endpoints within the check

Returns

  • True – If \(\mathrm{left} \leq N \leq \mathrm{right}\) (Assuming endpoints=True)

  • False – Otherwise

straddles_zero(endpoints=True) → bool

Checks whether \(0\) is within the p-box
